attributes.action: Stop loyal Alliance and Leicester staff being forced to work for other companies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to the takeover of Alliance and Leicester by Santander we have recently been advised that our part of the company does not exist within Santander and is in effect sold to a third party company (TUPE). We have been advised that we can move to the new company(ies) or make ourselves unemployed by choosing not to go to them. Surely this is contravening our human rights?

We respectfully request your urgent input on this matter
